verbs.description: SINGAPORE ( AP ) - [ARG1: Final preparations] [V: are] [ARG2: underway] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [C-ARG1: for Tuesday 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: including a] plan for the leaders to kick things off by meeting with only their translators present , a U.S. official said .

SINGAPORE ( AP ) - [ARG2: Final preparations] are underway in Singapore for Tuesday 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , [V: including] [ARG1: a plan for the leaders to kick things off by meeting with only their translators present] , a U.S. official said .

SINGAPORE ( AP ) - Final preparations are underway in Singapore for Tuesday 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , including a plan for [ARG0: the leaders] to [V: kick] [ARG1: things] off [ARGM-MNR: by meeting with only their translators present] , a U.S. official said .

SINGAPORE ( AP ) - Final preparations are underway in Singapore for Tuesday 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , including a plan for [ARG0: the leaders] to kick things off by [V: meeting] [ARG1: with only their translators present] , a U.S. official said .

[ARG1: SINGAPORE ( AP ) - Final preparations are underway in Singapore for Tuesday 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , including a plan for the leaders to kick things off by meeting with only their translators present] , [ARG0: a U.S. official] [V: said] .
